---
title: WIN Projektgebiete
subtitle: Übersichtskarten über alle Projketgebiete von WIN
output: html_document
out_dir: "docs"
---


```{r, echo = FALSE, results="asis", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(pander)
library(tidyverse)


files <- list.files("docs")
files <- files[!files == "index.html"]
files <- setNames(files, str_replace_all(str_remove(files,".html"),"\\.", " "))

cat(paste0("- ", imap_chr(files,~pandoc.link.return(.x,.y))),sep = " \n ")


```
